data.message: i have been drinking coca-cola for most of my life, i even started to drink coke zero but never diet coke it is disgusting. just after Christmas 2016 i stopped drinking coke instead i drink water for me this was a big change as my blood was 70% coke however i was almost 26 stone/364lb now i am just under 19 stone/266lb and still dropping. i will always be loyal to coca-cola but let me loose the rest of my weight first

replies.message: Love to hear your loyalty will not change thank you
i forgot to say that it is smart water from coca cola i drink its the best out there hands down (fact)
diet and zero are the same drink just different packaging. like diet for the ladies and zero for the guys.
no no no dave diet coke is totally different to zero and it is disgusting
